data.name: Blood Elf
data.description:
The Ancients - Blood Elf [W]
Units:
+5% evasion
-20% spell cooldown
-12% damage
-10% hit points

Buildings:
+12.5% mana

Upgrades:
+1Lv Magic

Magic:
Slow (Slows enemy unit by 15%)
Incinerate (Deals 100 damage to unit)
Polymorph (Disables enemy unit for 4s)
Phoenix Spirit (Deals 150 damage in a line)

Traits: Glass cannons. Extremely weak starting units. Very fragile even in late game. Heavily relies on special upgrades inside towers. Delivers short outbursts of damage. Strong against buff dependent races.

Dificulty: Expert

auras.name: Brilliance Aura
auras.description:
+0.1 MP/s to units and buildings
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Inspiration Aura
auras.description:
+20% unit damage
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Corruption Aura
auras.description:
-8 unit armor, +100 range buldings
(does not affect Special unit)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Arcane Mastery [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Mana Shield

Reduces spell damage to Strider, Archer, Guardian, Sorceress, Bladedancer and Dragonhawk Rider by 20% and increases their hit point regeneration by 1.5 HP/s.

Type: Anti Magic / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Orb of Fire [E]
bonuses.description:
Increases Bladedancer and Strider attack rate by 7% and gives them 20/25/30% to curse an enemy, reducing their armor by 4/6/8 and exploding upon death, dealing 30/40/50 dmg.
(upgrades together with Arcane Sanctum)

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Paladin Elites [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Energy Absorption

Blood Knight replaces Bladedancer
Melee Unit
+10% attack rate
+125 HP
Abilities:
Defend (Self Spell)
(20% to block an attack)
Shield Bash (Passive Skill)
(15% for 20 dmg, 1 sec stun)
(affects non-Hero units only)
Upgrades used:
Silverite Weapons
Silverite Armor
Energy Absorption
Magic Shield

Type: Early Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Lava Spawn [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Charged Glaives

Lava Spawn replaces Glaive Thrower
Siege Unit (Ranged)
+55% attack rate
+800 HP
Abilities:
Magma Aura (Support/Disable Aura)
(+6 and -6 armor in 600 AoE)
Condensed Lava (Passive Skill)
(300 extra dmg and 0.6s stun every 15s)
Upgrades used:
Silverite Weapons
Silverite Armor
Charged Glaives
Blood Sacrifice

Type: Late Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Blood Priest [S]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Persistent Missiles

Blood Priest replaces Sorceress
Spellcaster
+5% attack rate
+50 HP
+75 MP
Abilities:
Healing Hand (Passive Skill)
(25% for 25/50/75/100/125 HP to 3 units on cast )
Ignite (Damage Spell)
(300/350/400/450/500 dmg)
(to a single Air unit)
Upgrades used:
Blood Magic (Upgrades Abilities)
Silverite Armor
Persistent Missiles

Type: Strong Anti Air / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Phoenix Eggs [F]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Vorpal Missiles

Phoenix replaces Dragonhawk Rider
Air Unit
+200 HP
Abilities:
Phoenix Egg (Passive Skill)
(reincarnation after 45s)
(has 300 sec cooldown)
Phoenix Feathers (Passive Skill)
(30% to deal 60/70/80/90/100 dmg)
Upgrades used:
Vorpal Missiles (Upgrades Abilities)
Blood Magic
Silverite Armor

Type: Air Power

bonuses.name: Source of Magic [C]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Battle Mage

Icreases Arcane Sanctum and Sorceress mana by 10%. Unlocks more upgrades inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Sanctum spells by 30%.

Type: Magic Power / Base Defence

upgrades.description:

+15 Arcane Tower damage

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

bonuses.name: The Great Gladiator [Q]
bonuses.description:
Valeera replaces Lorhtemar

Hero Unit (Melee)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Assassin

250-400 damage
(300 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Valeera's Wrath (Passive Skill)
20-50% to do 5x damage
(does not affect Special unit)

Evasion (Passive Skill)

18-30% AS, 32-50% MS reduction
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Type: Hero Power / Anti Hero

towerUpgrades.name: Mana Shield
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: Activates a shield
Affects: Bladedancer, Strider and Guardian

Lv1: 0.5 damage per point of mana
Lv2: 0.75 damage per point of mana
Lv3: 1 damage per point of mana
Lv4: 1.25 damage per point of mana

spells.name: Mana Shield (1)
spells.description: Activates a shield that absorbs 0.75 damage per point of mana.

spells.name: Phantom Warriors Charge
spells.description: Increases move speed for 2.5 seconds.

spells.name: Phantom Warriors Shield
spells.description: An impenetrable shield surrounds this unit, protecting it from all damage and spells.

towerUpgrades.name: Vorpal Missiles
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: burns mana on each attack
Affects: Dragonhawk Rider
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: burns 15 mana per hit
Lv2: burns 30 mana per hit
Lv3: burns 45 mana per hit
Lv4: burns 60 mana per hit

towerUpgrades.name: Charged Glaives
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack rate and bouncing
Affects: Guardian and Glaive Thrower
(20%/50% damage loss per bounce)
(does not affect buildings)

Lv1: +5% attack rate, 1 bounce
Lv2: +10% attack rate, 2 bounces
Lv3: +15% attack rate, 3 bounces
Lv4: +20% attack rate, 4 bounces

towerUpgrades.name: Battle Mage
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in each wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Spell Steal (steals buffs)
has 20/15/10/5 sec cooldown
Lv2: has Silence (block abilities)
silences for 10/15/20 seconds
Lv3: has Defend (blocks damage)
30%/40% chance to block
Lv4: has Mindblast (stuns units)
stuns for 3 sec in 450 AoE

spells.name: Mindblast
spells.description: Stuns units for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Blood Rage
spells.description: Increases the attack rate by 120%, but drains 40 hit points per second. Lasts 8 seconds.

spells.name: Mana Shield (1)
spells.description: Activates a shield that absorbs 0.5 damage per point of mana.

spells.name: Spell Steal (Lv1)
spells.description: Steals a positive buff from an enemy unit and applies it to a friendly unit, or takes a negative buff from a friendly unit and applies it to an enemy unit.

spells.name: Silence 2
spells.description: Stops all enemies in a target area from casting spells for 0s.

towerUpgrades.name: Arcane Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: HP regeneration to nearby units
Affects: Strider
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: +2 HP/s in 400 AoE
Lv2: +4 HP/s in 500 AoE
Lv3: +6 HP/s in 600 AoE
Lv4: +8 HP/s in 700 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Energy Absorption
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: restores MP on kill
Affects: Bladedancer, Strider and Guardian
(450 area of effect)

Lv1: restores 5 MP
Lv2: restores 10 MP
Lv3: restores 15 MP
Lv4: restores 20 MP

spells.name: Blood Rage
spells.description: Increases the attack rate by 40%, but drains 10 hit points per second. Lasts 8 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Incinerating Arrows
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to splash fire
Affects: Archer
(splashes in 200 AoE for 10s)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 10% chance, -2 armor, 6 dmg/s
Lv2: 20% chance, -4 armor, 12 dmg/s
Lv3: 30% chance, -6 armor, 18 dmg/s
Lv4: 40% chance, -8 armor, 24 dmg/s

towerUpgrades.name: Persistent Missiles
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bouncing projectyles
Affects: Sorceress and Arcane Tower
(40/60% damage loss per bounce)
(does not affect buildings)

Lv1: can bounce 1 time
Lv2: can bounce 2 times
Lv3: can bounce 3 times
Lv4: can bounce 4 times

towerUpgrades.name: Blood Sacrifice
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: boost to your standing forces
Affects: Your dying Heroes
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +25% damage for 60 seconds
Lv2: +50% damage for 120 seconds
Lv3: +75% damage for 180 seconds
Lv4: +100% damage for 240 seconds

t1spell.name: Fireball Barrage [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoF.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Lightning Storm [X]
t2spell.description:
Sends shockwaves in all directions.
Each shockwave deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

fort.name: Arcane Sanctum (Lv3)
fort.description:
Gives:
Can train Special Unit
+5000 Arcane Sanctum hit points
+225 Arcane Sanctum mana
+4 Arcane Sanctum armor

skills.name: Fireball Barrage [Z]
skills.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoF.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

skills.name: Lightning Storm [X]
skills.description:
Sends shockwaves in all directions.
Each shockwave deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: Repair (Lv1) [Q]
skills.description:
Restores 100 HP over 15 seconds.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: Anti-Hero Sentry (Lv1)
skills.description: Attacks do 2x damage to Heroes.

skills.name: Anti-Hero Sentry (Lv1)
skills.description: Attacks do 2x damage to Heroes.

skills.name: Persistent Missiles (Lv1)
skills.description: Projectyles can bounce 1 time.

heroes.name: Blood Knight
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
Burning Spirit (Damage/Healing Spell)
restores 150-300 HP, or deals 150-300 dmg in 450 AoE
(10 second cooldown)

Mana Leech (Passive Skill)
heals 30-60 HP for each enemy spell
(restores 50% to allies withing 600 AoE)

Inspiration Aura (Support Aura)
8-32 damage bonus

Heavy Shield (Passive Skill)
16-40% to block an attack

heroes.name: Phantom Warrior
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Null Field (Disable Spell)
silences for 20-32s
(doesn't affect Special unit)
(also affects buildings)
(65-77 second cooldown)

Pulverize (Passive Skill)
15-27% for 120-240 area damage

Vampiric Aura (Support Aura)
18-30% melee lifesteal
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Mana Shield (Self Spell)
absorbs 17-23 HP per 1 MP
(10 second cooldown)

skills.name: Null Field - [Level 1]
skills.description: Stops all enemies in a target area from casting spells for 20 seconds.

skills.name: Mana Shield (1)
skills.description: Activates a shield that absorbs 20 damage per point of mana.

heroes.name: Blood Mage
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Nuker

Can learn:
Convection (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in an area
(200-350 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Living Bomb (Orb Effect)
30-90 damage on unit kill
(150-300 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)

Pyroblast (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(700-1000 wave distance)
(30 second cooldown)

Phoenix Spirit (Summoning Spell)
summons Phoenix for 30-90s
(60-120 second cooldown)

skills.name: Blizzard - [Level 4]
skills.description: Calls down freezing ice shards which deal 300 damage to units in an area.

skills.name: Pyroblast - [Level 7]
skills.description: Sends a gigantic wave which deals 225 damage to each enemy land unit in a line.

skills.name: Phoenix - [Level 1]
skills.description: Summons Phoenix for 30 seconds.
Burns nearby enemy units for 20 points of damage per second.

skills.name: Spell Resist
skills.description: Reduces spell damage by 45%.

skills.name: Heat Aura
skills.description: Reduces nearby enemy unit's armor by 6.

heroes.name: Phoenix Chimaera
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Rekindle (Healing Spell)
700-1000 HP to 6-12 unit over 5s
(affects organic units only)
(20 second cooldown)

Eternal Flame (Support Aura)
+75-375 max HP to allied units in 900 AoE
(30x that amount for In'thul)
(doesn't affect allied Heroes)

Resurrection (Summoning Spell)
revives 7-13 dead units
(60 second cooldown)

Soul Burn (Damage Spell)
30-60 damage per sec
(affects organic Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)
(30 second cooldown)

skills.name: Soul Burn - [Level 4]
skills.description: Wreaths an enemy unit in magical flames which cause <ANso,DataA1> damage per second and prevent the casting of spells.

heroes.name: Gladiator
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs Heroes
Weak Vs All Units, Buildings

Role: Assassin

Can learn:
Whirlwind (Damage Spell)
250-400 damage
(300 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Valeera's Wrath (Passive Skill)
20-50% to do 5x damage
(does not affect Special unit)

Evasion (Passive Skill)
13-25% to evade an attack

Gladiator's Grip (Disable mini Aura)
18-30% AS, 32-50% MS reduction
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

skills.name: Warden's Grip - [Level 4]
skills.description: Reduces attack rate by 18% and move speed by 32%.

skills.name: Whirlwind 1 lvl
skills.description: Deal 250 damage to ground enemy units.

items.name: Varian's Gift  (Unique)
items.description:
+5 Agility
Permanent +1 All Stats for killing enemy Heroes

magic.name: Blood Magic (Lv1) [W]
magic.description:
Gives:
Sorceress can cast Slow
Slows enemy unit by 15%
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)
+24 Dragonhawk Rider damage
+12 Sorceress damage
+0.5 MP/sec Sorceress mana reg

spells.name: Phoenix Spirit
spells.description: A wave of force ripples outward, dealing 150 damage to units in a line.

spells.name: Incinerate
spells.description: Blasts enemy unit with 100 damage. Nearby units take 50% of this damage.

spells.name: Slow
spells.description:
Slows a target enemy unit's attack rate and movement speed by 15%.
Lasts 120 seconds.

spells.name: Polymorph
spells.description:
Turns a target enemy unit into a sheep. The targeted unit retains its hit points and armor, but cannot attack.
Lasts 4 seconds.

spells.name: Healing Hand (lv1)
spells.description: Calls forth a wave of healing energy that bounces up to 3 times, healing 25 hit points to friendly units.

spells.name: Ignite (Lv1)
spells.description: Ignites air unit dealing damage over time.
